channel.title: [RS2] [SRL] Auto-Hide Tanner
channel.description:
Well heres my first proper script. It tans hides in alkarid, it can tan all kinds of hides.
Instructions are in the script. Please post comments/suggestions .
Please note: to test you don't have to have hides just go to alkarid bank and run it .
Please, post progress reports.
Also, can a scripter please tell me if my scripting standards are any good now? in v1.0 They were terrible :|
Edit: Should this be in then SRL public scripts section? [code] /\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\ Using Hide Tanner BETA by [Endr1x] Have Tanned : 810 of green hides for :username Tanned : 810 in total. Script Worked for : 58 Minutes, and 45 Seconds
/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\ [/code]
~Endr1x
Things I've added to 1.1:
AutoColouring. RadialWalk. Multi-player Support. Improved Ellis Finding . Better Walking accuracy. Better ProgReport. Improved banking. Scripting Standards
